name: lmoustak.brackets-tortoise-svn
title: Brackets TortoiseSVN
description: FOR WINDOWS ONLY. Adds TortoiseSVN commands like commit, switch, update, revert, log, diff, blame in File menu, directory tree and working set context menus
author: Laertes Moustakas <lmoustak@gmail.com> (https://github.com/lmoustak/brackets-tortoise-svn)
